mapper.select: select * from public."room_Info" where build_code=7 and delete_flag='0'
mapper.update: update public."room_Info" set room_title=#{room_title}, max=#{max},adult_cost=#{adult_cost} , child_cost=#{child_cost} , explanation=#{explanation} ,images= #{images} , color_code=#{color_code} , updated_at= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where no=#{no} and build_code=7
update public."room_Info" set delete_flag=#{delete_flag} where no=#{no} and build_code=7
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO public."room_Info" (no, room_num, room_title, max, adult_cost, child_cost, explanation, images, color_code, delete_flag, created_at, updated_at, build_code) VALUES(nextval('room_info_seq'),#{room_num},#{room_title},#{max},#{adult_cost},#{child_cost},#{explanation},#{images},#{color_code}, '0', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 7)
